allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add live Solana blockchain payouts page

- New /api/payouts endpoint fetches real USDC transactions from payout wallet
- Payouts page shows live treasury balance, total paid out, transaction count
- Live transactions feed with links to Solscan for each TX
- 30-day payout volume chart with daily breakdown
- Auto-refresh every 30 seconds
- Added PAYOUT_WALLET_ADDRESS env variable

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
